name: Zetharis [M. Version DEMO]
description:

THIS PAGE IS FOR THE DEMO VERSION OF THE GAME. IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR NEWER VERSIONS WITH NEW CONTENT/FEATURES THAT ARE UNSTABLE, CHECK:

https://scaryscary.itch.io/zetharis-dev-ver

This is  M (Mature) version of the game. The only difference compared to the AO version, is the lack of adult scenes, the rest is the same.

Also this project is made by one guy, so... Expect issues?

(Maybe in the future if that project goes somewhere I'll be able to hire artists and musicians to help me with that... But who knows. )

The story is simple.

You are an otherworlder, summoned into this world.

You are alone.  You have no one to rely on, and you have no other choice, but to survive.

You have no idea who sent you there, or how you got there either. 

It is up to you, on how you will shape your fate.

Hello!

Zetharis is a game that was inspired by various games, text adventures and JRPG games, mainly Shin Megami Tensei.
It features (Or will feature, the game is still in developement):

-A unique combat system similar to press turn(Mainline SMT), where combat can take from a few seconds to a few minutes, depending on your skill and how well can you handle the encounters.

-Open world that you can choose to explore in your own way.

-Companions with their own unique stories and personalities.

-Classic dungeon crawling gameplay. (Well. A little bit of it. Sorry, cutting corners to release something is better than developement hell!)

-Branching dialogue paths. (Or well. An attempt at having that.)

The game is available for PC (Windows, Linux builds might be coming later.) and Android devices, and it's free, there are no microtransactions, ads or tracking either.

Please enjoy!

System Requirements: (Subject to change.)

PC minimum requirements:

MONITOR: A monitor with a resolution of 1280 x 720 at the minimum, ultrawide is supported. 4:3 is not.

RAM: At least 2GB of Ram.

OS: Windows 10 was the one I tested it on. It working on windows lower than 10 is currently unknown.

Hard Drive: At least 512MB of Free Space.

GPU: Anything with at least 1-2GB of VRAM would do the trick. Modern iGPUs should work without a problem.

CPU: Any quad core CPU with a speed of at least 2.8GHZ should be fine.

Internet connection: Not required. The game is always offline.

Phone minimum requirements: (Subject to change.)

DISPLAY: A display with the resolution of at least 1280 x 720p, ultrawide is supported, 4:3 is not. IPS or LCD display is reccomended.  (5.5-6+ inch device is reccomended.)

RAM: At least 2GB of Ram.

OS: Android 6+ is reccomended. Currently there are no plans to make an IOS version, not to mention I don't have a device to test it on.

Free Space: At least 512MB of Free Space.

GPU: Currently minimum is unknown, please report the performance on lower end devices if possible. Tested on a device with Adreno 640.

CPU: Currently minimum is unknown, please report the performance on lower end devices if possible. Tested on a device with Snapdragon 855.

Internet connection: Not required. The game is always offline.

Found a bug or perhaps my terrible grammar that needs fixing?

Send the screenshot and reproduction steps to my email at scaryscarydeveloper@gmail.com, and I'll do my best to fix it.
